name: The Void (itch) (Alexander Mastryukov)
description:
Humans have discovered a bottomless pit on an extraterrestrial planet. 

You have been selected for the one man crew that must descend into the hole to retrieve samples that may provide insight into the origin of the formation.

Programmers:

  • Alexander Mastryukov
  • Zuhair Ghias
  • John Marman

Artists:

  • Tina Zhang (2D)
  • Axel Kulomaa (3D)
  • Ceyhun Yanikdag (misc)

Soundtrack: 

Another World by Maxthor (maxthor.bandcamp.com)
